mapper.insert: insert into order_info(CATEGORY_CODE, STORE_CODE, ID, ORDER_DATE, PHONE, MENU_CNT, PRICE, ORDER_STATE, ORDER_TIME, ORDER_PEPLE) VALUES(#{category_code}, #{store_code}, #{id}, #{order_date}, #{phone}, #{menu_cnt}, #{price}, #{order_state}, #{order_time}, #{order_peple})
mapper.select: select * from order_info o LEFT outer join store_info s on o.store_code = s.store_code where s.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into order_history( menu_cnt, price, order_date, order_num, category_code, store_code, id, total_info) values(#{menu_cnt}, #{price}, #{order_date}, #{order_num}, #{category_code}, #{store_code}, #{id}, #{total_info} )
